short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you copy paste Wiki easily without links and citations!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you feel annoyed by removing citations one by one from Wiki? Perhaps you're running out of time, or just lazy, well this extension for you!

Features :
- Removing links, citations, style, or anything besides text and images.
- Make wiki pages ugly but easier to copy paste.
- [COMING SOON] Customizable which one you want to remove! :D
